languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс пристально смотрит на вас, и вы не можете понять, с удивлением или гневом. Потом отрывисто кивает.{/n} "Ясно. Догадки будем строить потом — хотя, {name}, трактовок его слов не так уж и много".

traits.locale_text: {n}Хейнрикс пристально смотрит на вас, и вы не можете понять, с удивлением или гневом. Потом отрывисто кивает.{/n} "Ясно". {n}Он рассеянно отряхивает руки, словно испачкался в чем-то.{/n} "Догадки будем строить потом — хотя, {name}, трактовок его слов не так уж и много. Пойдем. Нам нужно двигаться дальше".

languages.text: {n}Heinrix stares at you — whether in surprise or anger, you do not know. Then he gives a curt nod.{/n} "I see. We can theorise later — although I will say, {name}, that his words do not leave much room for interpretation."
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс пристально смотрит на вас, и вы не можете понять, с удивлением или гневом. Потом отрывисто кивает.{/n} "Ясно. Догадки будем строить потом — хотя, {name}, трактовок его слов не так уж и много".

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix looks at you closely, whether with surprise or anger — you're unsure. Then he gives a curt nod.{/n} "I see. We can theorize later — although I will say, {name}, that his words do not leave much room for interpretation. Come. We need to keep moving."

{n}Heinrix looks at you closely, whether with surprise or anger — you're unsure. Then he gives a curt nod.{/n} "I see. We can theorize later — although I will say, {name}, that his words do not leave much room for interpretation. Come. We need to keep moving."

{n}Heinrix looks at you closely, whether with surprise or anger — you're unsure. Then he gives a curt nod.{/n} "I see. We can theorise later — although I will say, {name}, that his words do not leave much room for interpretation."

{n}Heinrix looks at you closely, whether with surprise or anger — you're unsure. Then he gives a curt nod.{/n} "I see. We can theorise later — although I will say, {name}, that his words do not leave much room for interpretation."

{n}Heinrix stares at you — whether in surprise or anger, you do not know. Then he gives a curt nod.{/n} "I see. We can theorise later — although I will say, {name}, that his words do not leave much room for interpretation."

{n}Heinrix stares at you — whether in surprise or anger, you do not know. Then he gives a curt nod.{/n} "I see. We can theorise later — although I will say, {name}, that his words do not leave much room for interpretation."

languages.text: {n}Heinrix te mira fijamente, aunque no sabes si lo que ves en sus ojos es sorpresa o ira. Asiente brevemente.{/n} «Ya veo. Podremos especular más adelante, {name}, pero sus palabras no ofrecen muchas interpretaciones alternativas».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix stares at you — whether in surprise or anger, you do not know. Then he gives a curt nod.{/n} "I see. We can theorise later — although I will say, {name}, that his words do not leave much room for interpretation."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix te mira intensamente, aunque no sabes si lo que ves en sus ojos es sorpresa o ira. Asiente brevemente.{/n} «Ya veo. Podremos especular más adelante, {name}, pero sus palabras no ofrecen muchas interpretaciones alternativas».

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスは驚きとも怒りともとれるような表情でこちらをジッと見つめ、そっけなくうなずいた。{/n}「なるほど。理論は後で考えましょう。だが、{name}さん…奴の言葉は解釈の余地はあまりありません」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix stares at you — whether in surprise or anger, you do not know. Then he gives a curt nod.{/n} "I see. We can theorise later — although I will say, {name}, that his words do not leave much room for interpretation."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスは驚きとも怒りともとれるような表情でこちらをジッと見つめ、そっけなくうなずいた。{/n}「なるほど。理論は後で考えましょう。だが、{name}さん…奴の言葉は解釈の余地はあまりありません」

languages.text: {n}海因里希紧紧地盯着你，你无法确定他眼中的情感是惊讶还是愤怒。随后，他简短地点点头。{/n}“我明白了，这件事情我们可以稍后理性分析。但我得事先声明，{name}，他的话并没留下太多可供自由解释的空间。”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix stares at you — whether in surprise or anger, you do not know. Then he gives a curt nod.{/n} "I see. We can theorise later — although I will say, {name}, that his words do not leave much room for interpretation."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希紧紧地盯着你，你无法确定他眼中的情感是惊讶还是愤怒。随后，他简短地点点头。{/n}“我明白了，这件事情我们可以稍后理性分析。但我得事先声明，{name}，他的话并没留下太多可供自由解释的空间。”

languages.text: {n}Heinrix vous dévisage avec intensité, mais vous ne parvenez pas à savoir si son regard reflète la surprise ou la colère. Puis il fait un signe de tête.{/n} « Je vois. Nous en débattrons plus tard, {name}, mais j'ai bien peur que ses paroles ne laissent que peu de place à l'interprétation. »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix stares at you — whether in surprise or anger, you do not know. Then he gives a curt nod.{/n} "I see. We can theorise later — although I will say, {name}, that his words do not leave much room for interpretation."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix vous observe attentivement, mais vous ne parvenez pas à savoir si son regard reflète la surprise ou la colère. Puis il fait un signe de tête.{/n} « Je vois. Nous en débattrons plus tard, {name}, mais j'ai bien peur que ses paroles ne laissent que peu de place à l'interprétation. »

languages.text: {n}Heinrix starrt dich an ... ob aus Überraschung oder Wut, weiß du nicht. Dann nickt er knapp.{/n} "Ich verstehe. Wir können später Theorien aufstellen, auch wenn ich sagen muss, {name}, dass seine Worte nicht viel Raum zur Interpretation lassen."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix stares at you — whether in surprise or anger, you do not know. Then he gives a curt nod.{/n} "I see. We can theorise later — although I will say, {name}, that his words do not leave much room for interpretation."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix mustert dich genau. Du weißt nicht, ob überrascht oder zornig. Dann nickt er knapp.{/n} "Ich verstehe. Wir können später Theorien aufstellen, auch wenn ich sagen muss, {name}, dass seine Worte nicht viel Raum zur Interpretation lassen."

languages.text: {n}Heinrix'in bakışları sana sabitleniyor. Şaşkınlık mı yoksa öfke mi hissettiğini bilmiyorsun. Sonra başıyla kısaca onaylıyor.{/n} "Anladım. Durumu daha sonra değerlendiririz {name}. Gerçi yorumlanacak pek bir şey göremiyorum."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix stares at you — whether in surprise or anger, you do not know. Then he gives a curt nod.{/n} "I see. We can theorise later — although I will say, {name}, that his words do not leave much room for interpretation."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix’in bakışları sana sabitleniyor. Şaşkınlık mı yoksa öfke mi hissettiğini bilmiyorsun. Sonra başıyla kısaca onaylıyor.{/n} “Anladım. Ayrıntıları daha sonra konuşuruz, {name}. Gerçi sözlerinde pek bir ayrıntı göremiyorum.”
